message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.AR, cs.ET. 

The paper discusses the use of logic and Boolean methods for verifying the correctness of processor control logic, which falls under the category of formal verification. The paper specifically focuses on the logic of equality with uninterpreted functions (EUF) and its reduction to propositional logic, which is a topic within mathematical logic (cs.LO). The use of Boolean methods such as Ordered Binary Decision Diagrams (BDDs) and Boolean satisfiability checkers also falls under the category of programming languages and software engineering (cs.PL) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the experimental results of verifying pipelined processors, which falls under the category of computer architecture (cs.AR) and embedded systems (cs.ET).
